Doc: Specifies how long to wait to get a quote from a settlement rate option upon a price source disruption.

Source.Contents:
/#
   Specifies how long to wait to get a quote from a settlement rate option upon a price source disruption.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.ValuationPostponement {
  # The maximum number of days to wait for a quote from the disrupted settlement rate option before proceding to the next method.
  maximumDaysOfPostponement : int( 1, * )?

}

maximumDaysOfPostponement.Doc: The maximum number of days to wait for a quote from the disrupted settlement rate option before proceding to the next method.
maximumDaysOfPostponement.Name: maximumDaysOfPostponement
